item.description:
"Sunday morning blueberry pancakes @ the Miss Worcester Diner, then walk..."
How about Sunday morning blueberry pancakes at the historic
Miss Worcester Diner,
(300 Southbridge Street, Worcester, MA 01608),
breakfast @ 9:00 AM, small booths, big food, little price.

http://www.roadsideon...

followed by a nice walk at Broad Meadow Brook,
(414 Massasoit Road, Worcester, MA 01604)
Meet for the walk @ 10:00-10:15 AM
Massachusetts Audubon Society: Broad Meadow Brook
www.massaudubon.org
414 Massasoit Road
Worcester, MA 01604-3546

http://www.massaudubo...

Free for Worcester residents. Children welcome. No pets.
item.how_to_find_us: It's a tiny diner that seats 37 people. At Broad Meadows, we'll be just inside at registration about 10:15 AM

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: "Sunday morning blueberry pancakes @ the Miss Worcester Diner, then walk..."
